Package ohos.sysappcomponents.settings

Class SystemSettings.TTS

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.settings.SystemSettings.TTS
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemSettings

    public static class SystemSettings.TTS
extends Object
    Provides methods for setting information about text-to-speech (TTS) conversion, including the pitch, speech rate, engine, and plug-ins.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String DEFAULT_TTS_PITCH
      Indicates the default pitch of the text-to-speech (TTS) engine.
      static String DEFAULT_TTS_RATE
      Indicates the default speech rate of the TTS engine.
      static String DEFAULT_TTS_SYNTH
      Indicates the default TTS engine.
      static String ENABLED_TTS_PLUGINS
      Indicates the list of activated plug-in packages used for TTS.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_TTS_PITCH

        public static final String DEFAULT_TTS_PITCH
        Indicates the default pitch of the text-to-speech (TTS) engine.

        100 = 1x. If the value is set to 200, the frequency is twice the normal sound frequency.

        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TTS_RATE

        public static final String DEFAULT_TTS_RATE
        Indicates the default speech rate of the TTS engine. 100 = 1x.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TTS_SYNTH

        public static final String DEFAULT_TTS_SYNTH
        Indicates the default TTS engine.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENABLED_TTS_PLUGINS

        public static final String ENABLED_TTS_PLUGINS
        Indicates the list of activated plug-in packages used for TTS. Multiple plug-in packages are separated by spaces.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
